column3: ## Test notes searchable for admin and not for public

In the admin search, select Journal search, search for a journal and click on the "Edit Journal" button to edit the journal

http://testdoaj.cottagelabs.com//admin

column4: The journal edit form is displayed

column3: Add a note to a journal record by clicking on the "Add" button in the "Notes" section of the journal record.  Add a distinctive note whose text is unlikely to appear in a journal title or other metadata.  Then click on "save" button to save the new note

column4: The note is added to the journal record

column3:
Go to the admin journal search again and search for the journal you added the note with the words given in the note

http://testdoaj.cottagelabs.com//admin

column4: The journal record is displayed in the search results

column3:
Search for the journal from public search page with the distinctive words from the note

http://testdoaj.cottagelabs.com//search/journals

column4: The journal record is not displayed in the search results

column3:
Go to the API documentation page

http://testdoaj.cottagelabs.com//api/docs
Scroll to the section "Search" > "Search journals" and click on the row to expand it.
in the section "search_query" enter the distinctive words from the note you created, then click on the "Try it Out!" button at the bottom of the section

column4: The journal record is not displayed in the search results
